questions.question: How many centers of symmetry does a SCP unit cell have?

explanations.b: SCP only has one center of symmetry, at the center of the unit cell

questions.question: How many centers of symmetry does a BCC unit cell have?

explanations.b: BCC only has one center of symmetry, at the center of the unit cell

questions.question: How many planes of symmetry does a SCP unit cell have?

explanations.d: A SCP unit cell has 9 planes of symmetry

questions.question: How many planes of symmetry does a BCC unit cell have?

explanations.d: A BCC unit cell has 9 planes of symmetry

questions.question: How many 4-fold axes of symmetry does the FCC unit cell have?

explanations.a: A FCC unit cell has three 4-fold axes of symmetry

questions.question: How many 2-fold axes of symmetry does the HCP unit cell have?

explanations.c: A HCP unit cell has three 2-fold axes of symmetry
